Name: Biscotti Spritz
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: POUR prosecco and liqueurs into glass. ADD ice. Top with soda.
Review: Hazelnut and butterscotch liqueurs flavour this Prosecco-based spritz. Better when complemented by a biscotti biscuit.
History: Created in 2013 by yours truly for Jamie's Italian Bar. See Spritz cocktail history and more recipes
Nutrition: One serving of Biscotti Spritz contains 179 calories
Garnish: Biscotti biscuit across top of glass
